text: @EU_Commission #EnergyPriceHike #RussiaUkraineGasDeal #GermanyTax #EU2027 #FossilFuels #Norway #US #Moscow"Uncertainty in the pipeline: Germany's unilateral tax on gas exports is reducing incentives for energy firms to invest in non-Russian supplies. Time for EU energy ministers to discuss and find a solution at Monday's meeting in Brussels.
